more.description: - Design and develop REST APIs to support our mobile client. - Architect and build robust, scalable, and highly available backend systems - Work closely with the client app team and product design team to iterate quickly on new features and experiments - Design and build web-based products
more.requirement: - Experience working on PHP (or Python, C++, Java, NodeJs), MySQL, JS, CSS, HTML, Nginx, Apache, Linux - Deep knowledge of caching, message queue, event-based programming - Deep knowledge of client server communication protocols (REST, HTTP, JSON, XML) - Experience designing and developing RESTful web services for mobile apps - Experience in designing and developing scalable Backend components - 2+ years of experience in software engineering - Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic team - Self-starter, capable of leading and owning a large aspect of the product - BS or higher in Computer Science or related technical field
